Collections for Charities Regulations 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Collections for Charities Act 2001 .

9 August 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Workplace Safety and Consumer Affairs

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Collections for Charities Regulations 2021 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on 17 August 2021.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations â€“
        Act means the Collections for Charities Act 2001.

4. Authorised soliciting by religious organisations
    For the purposes of section 4(j) of the Act, soliciting by a religious organisation, by way of an appeal to its adherents or any other person who has attended a religious service held by that organisation, is authorised.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 August 2021

These regulations are administered in the Department of Justice.
